com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui
Class GameWindow

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui.GameWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardBoardUI, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GameWindow
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements CardBoardUI, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Displays the state of the CardBoard game in a single window.

Operations:
  • GameWindow displays the game state in a window.
  • GameWindow can return the current x,y coordinates of the open inlay slot.
  • GameWindow can prompt the user for his or her name and return it.

Version:
1.2, 01/12/08
Author:
Lamont Samuels, Immortal Labs CSC309 W09, Sky Eckstrom, Rusty Nail CSC308 F08
See Also:
Serialized Form
Version History:

- 11/30/08 1.0 Inital Class Skeleton

y - the y location where the mouse was pressed
Returns:
a button if the x and y is within the bounds of the button, otherwise NULL
